effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has less than half its max HP remaining, this move has double power.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has less than half its max HP remaining, this move has double power.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has less than half its max HP remaining, this move has double power.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Has double power against Pokémon that have less than half their max HP remaining.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Has double power against Pokémon that have less than half their max HP remaining.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Has double power against Pokémon that have less than half their max HP remaining.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: This move's power is doubled if the target's HP is at half or less.
